about.text1: Foto&video Designo is a craft business with many years of experience.
about.text2: It was founded out of a great love for photography, specifically for turning moments into memories.
about.text3: In addition to studio photography, we travel to your home address and create the most beautiful memories in the comfort of your own home.
about.text4: Our goal is to ensure every moment remains forever captured and displayed in the most unique way possible.
about.text5: Satisfied clients are our greatest motivation, so feel free to reach out to us with confidence.

review1.name: Marina Bartulović
review1.text: The best photo booth aunt in the world! ❤️ Full of patience...

review2.name: Lea Badovinac
review2.text: I was delighted with the adorable and professional photos...

review3.name: Ivana Jurakić
review3.text: Kristina is professional, subtly present at all times, with a smile...

contact.title: Get in Touch with
contact.text: Whether you're looking for stunning photography or breathtaking videos, we're here to help you make it happen.
